name: ai-battle-royale
description: AI Battle Royale - 100 AI agents, one world, players vote to influence the outcome

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter shared build && concurrently "pnpm --filter shared dev" "pnpm --filter server dev" "pnpm --filter web dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter server build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/.next packages/*/*.tsbuildinfo node_modules
